name: Volvo: Drive For Life
description: Welcome to the Volvo Drive for Life gaming experience... a crash course in high performance driving, Volvo-style. Come tour the Volvo industry leading safety center. It's a one-of-a-kind safety laboratory where accidents are looked at and Volvo safety systems developed. Then check out and smash up some of the world's safest cars on our specially designed driver safety proving grounds. If you make the cut, we'll see what you're made of on one of our simulated driving courses. So prepare yourself for a game experience that makes driving fun. Ready... Set... Drive.
